name: City Bus Driver Game
description:
Github Repository About!
This game created in 5 days by me for case study.

Your point is to board passengers to the bus as much as you can and disembark 'em to red arrow points where shown up on the map. More passengers mean more scores and more times! If you accidentally hit somewhere your score point and your time decreases and it's related to your speed, so drive carefully!

You can interact with the bus in the FPS mode. Just switch your camera and try to open and close the bus doors. Don't forget, you must open the bus doors and slow down to near the bus stops while boarding and disembarking passengers.
